scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Calendar_EventRegistrationAdd_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
$core_v2_page.AddLink('stylesheet', $core_v2_widget.GetExecutedFileUrl('style.less'), "%{ Position = 'AfterTheme' }") #set ($event = false) #set ($event = $calendar_v1_events.Current) #set ($userId = $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id) #set ($user = $core_v2_user.Accessing) #set ($userIsRegistered = $core_v2_user.IsRegistered($userId)) #if (!$event || $event.IsCancelled || $event.EventEndDate <= $calendar_v1_UI.AdjustForUserTime($core_v2_utility.CurrentDate)) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #if(!$userIsRegistered) #set ($userId =-1) #end #set ($firstName = "") #set ($lastName = "") #if ($userIsRegistered) #set ($nameArray = $core_v2_utility.Split(" ", $user.DisplayName).ToArray()) #set ($firstName = $nameArray.get(0)) #if ($nameArray.Count > 1) #set ($lastName = $core_v2_utility.Trim($user.DisplayName.Substring($firstName.Length))) #end #end #set($group = false) #set($group = $core_v2_group.Current) #set ($calendar = false) #set ($calendar = $calendar_v1_calendars.Current) #set ($registration = false) #set ($registration = $calendar_v1_registrations.Current) #if (!$registration) #set ($registration = $calendar_v1_registrations.Get($event.Id, $user.Id)) #end #if($event.RegistrationType == 'NotSet' || (!$event.AllowAnonymousRegistrations && !$userIsRegistered) || ($event.RegistrationType == 'InvitationOnly' && !$registration)) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #if($event.RegistrationType != "InvitationOnly" && !$registration) #if(($event.TotalRegistrations >= $event.MaximumRegistrationsAllowed) && $event.MaximumRegistrationsAllowed > 0) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end #end
$core_v2_language.GetResource("RegistrationSavingSuccess")
$core_v2_language.GetResource("calendar_GenericError")
#if ($registration && $registration.Status == 'Confirmed')
$core_v2_language.GetResource("Registration_AttendingEvent")
#elseif ($registration && $registration.Status == 'Invited')
$core_v2_language.GetResource("Registration_Invited")
#elseif (($registration && $registration.Status == 'Cancelled') || $core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('cancelled') == 'true')
$core_v2_language.GetResource("Registration_Cancelled")
#elseif ($core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('registered') == 'NotApproved')
$core_v2_language.GetResource("Registration_RequestSuccessful")
#end
  • #if ($registration == false || $registration.Status == 'Cancelled') $core_v2_language.GetResource('AddRegistration') #elseif ($registration && ($registration.Status == 'Confirmed' || $registration.Status == 'NotApproved')) $core_v2_language.GetResource('UpdateRegistration') | $core_v2_language.GetResource('CancelRegistration') #elseif ($registration && $registration.Status == 'Invited') $core_v2_language.GetResource('AcceptInvitation') | $core_v2_language.GetResource('RejectInvitation') #end
#if (!$userIsRegistered)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('CancelRegistration')
#end #registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.Calendar.widgets.eventregistrationadd') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="linkArea" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="CF_Title" defaultValue="${resource:Calendar_EventRegistrationAdd_Title}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="AcceptInvitation">Accept Invitation</resource> <resource name="AddRegistration">Register for this Event</resource> <resource name="Calendar_EventRegistrationAdd_Description">Allows a user to register for an event and displays the status of that registration</resource> <resource name="Calendar_EventRegistrationAdd_Name">Event Calendar - Add/Edit Registration</resource> <resource name="Calendar_EventRegistrationAdd_Title">Registration</resource> <resource name="calendar_GenericError">An error occurred.</resource> <resource name="calendar_validator_emailFormat">Invalid Email Address</resource> <resource name="calendar_validator_emailLength">Email Address Length should not exceed 256 characters</resource> <resource name="calendar_validator_emailRequired">Email Address is required</resource> <resource name="calendar_validator_firstNameLength">First Name should not exceed 128 characters</resource> <resource name="calendar_validator_firstNameRequired">First Name is required</resource> <resource name="calendar_validator_lastNameLength">Last Name should not exceed 128 characters</resource> <resource name="calendar_validator_lastNameRequired">Last Name is required</resource> <resource name="CancelRegistration">Cancel Registration</resource> <resource name="CF_Title">Widget Title</resource> <resource name="EmailAddress">Email Address</resource> <resource name="FirstName">First Name</resource> <resource name="invalid_Guid">Registration code is not valid</resource> <resource name="LastName">Last Name</resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> <resource name="Registration_AttendingEvent">You are currently attending this event.</resource> <resource name="Registration_Cancelled">Your registration has been cancelled.</resource> <resource name="Registration_Invited">You have been invited to attend this event.</resource> <resource name="Registration_RequestSuccessful">Your registration request has been received. You will receive further information soon.</resource> <resource name="RegistrationCancelling">Cancelling Registration...</resource> <resource name="RegistrationCancellingError">An error occurred cancelling Event Registration</resource> <resource name="RegistrationCancellingSuccess">Registration cancelled successfully</resource> <resource name="RegistrationCode">Registration Code</resource> <resource name="RegistrationSaving">Saving Registration...</resource> <resource name="RegistrationSavingError">An error occurred creating Event Registration</resource> <resource name="RegistrationSavingSuccess">Registration created successfully</resource> <resource name="RegistrationUpdating">Updating Registration...</resource> <resource name="RegistrationUpdatingError">An error occurred updating Event Registration</resource> <resource name="RegistrationUpdatingSuccess">Registration updated successfully</resource> <resource name="RejectInvitation">Reject Invitation.</resource> <resource name="UpdateRegistration">Update Registration</resource> </language>
